entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 29 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 33. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 34 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023
